wiimando.model
Class WiiMando

java.lang.Object
  wiiremotej.event.WiiRemoteAdapter
      wiimando.model.WiiMando
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, wiiremotej.event.WiiRemoteListener
public class WiiMando
extends wiiremotej.event.WiiRemoteAdapter

Uses the WiiRemoteJ API to define actions for acceleration and button events. Responsible for connecting and disconnecting the wiiremote. Uses the wiiremote X and Y acceleration values to calculate the mouse pointer movement. Based on the code of Michael Diamond, version 1/05/07 (WRLImpl.java).

Version:
2009/10/19
Author:
Boris Júnior, Jorge Pereira
